full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHA' 'GRO SENGGE GDONG BA CAN GYIS GRIB SEL BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES SENG GDONG MA'I GRIB SEL 'DI YANG DI YING RANG GI SLOB MA LA LHOG PA'I NA TSA DRAG BYUNG BA LA BRTEN PA BLUN PO BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,YI DAM SENG GDONG MA LA GSOL BA 'DEBS 'DI LA BU'I PHAN ZHES NA TSA LA BYUNG BA LA BRTEN NI 'PHRAL DU BRIS PA, ,'DI CAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
